items.text: short ball outside off, that was rising more, didn't get any timing on his intended swat, ends up under-edging to short midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chase, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, guided to third man by opening the face of the bat and staying in his crease
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chase, 1 run

items.text: fuller ball on the stumps, he cleared his back leg and was looking to go big over the off-side. Hits it reasonably enough, but along the ground to deep point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: through him off cutter that he completely missed. Went towards the length ball intending to turn it to midwicket, it sneaked in through the gap between bat and body, but was bouncing too high. Over the stumps
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chase, no run

items.text: patted back to the bowler
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chase, no run

items.preText: Mark: "Everything suggests that the ODIs are going to go no better than the Tests for the West Indies. They will be looking forward more to England's visit, but will need to show a lot more resolution to get something out of it."
items.text: that's a surprise bouncer back of a length and rising, it continued to rise while going past the batsman's outside edge, Rahim collects it above his head. They appeal for a caught behind, but there was no edge, only a poke that connected with air
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: cut to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: cops on one the gloves moved forward to defend this length ball on off, but it seemed to rise a mite higher and caught him on the gloves
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, no run

items.text: good length angling into the batsman, who covers the line and turns it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, no run

items.text: back of a length, nipping back into the batsman a bit, who stays back and tucks it down to fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, 1 run

items.preText: Faruq: "That wicket of Powell was the result of pure pressure. Beautiful tight bowling and Mashrafe, what a persevering asset he has been for Bangladesh. A Salute!"
items.text: length ball outside off, and driven to deep cover. The pacier Rubel's balls might come on to the bat better
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chase, 1 run

items.text: smart catch at long-on very full on middle stump, he cleared his front leg out of the way and got hold of it, lifting it over the bowler. Liton at long-on kept his composure though and held the ball over his head, a foot inside the rope.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, OUT

dismissal.text: MN Samuels c Liton Das b Rubel Hossain 25 (48b 2x4 0x6) SR: 52.08

items.preText: Keemo Paul in. West Indies are continuing to unravel
items.text: fuller length on the pads, he goes back in his crease to turn it towards square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Paul, 1 run

items.text: extra bounce back of a length, went past the batsman at chest height, he was getting down low to glide it to third man, but is beaten by the bounce. It's still rising when Rahim collects
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chase, no run

items.text: off-cutter, too full, driven nicely back but Liton at mid on dives and stops the ball. Has a direct hit too, to boot, but the batsmen were well in
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chase, 1 run

items.text: fuller ball clipped to short midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Paul, no run

items.preText: Thanks, Saurabh. We are into the last ten overs. Can West Indies finally make some amends?
items.text: length outside off, driven towards long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length, just around off, keeps quite low and hits the the toe-end of the bat and rolls towards point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Paul, 1 run

items.text: back of length, chipped towards short midwicket, was in the air for a while but away from the fielder
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Paul, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, swept towards deep backward point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Paul, 1 run

items.text: floated outside off, looks to work it on the leg side, gets a leading edge towards backward square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.preText: Mustafizur is back in the attack
items.text: starts with a back of the length delivery, dabbed towards point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, no run

items.text: jumps at the batsman from short of length, the batsman was looking to play on the leg side, the leading edge just went over Soumya Sarkar at extra cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, 1 run
